name: Super Water Bottle Master
description:
You play as a guy with a water bottle. Not only can you hit things with your bottle,  but you can also drink from it.  Make sure you collect water though, as your attacks will become weaker as your water runs out. There isn't a whole lot to it.

Should work with any Xinput controller (preferably a 360 controller).

This was created for the GMTK Game Jam (7/14/2017).

This is also my first game and my first jam.
